en: In 2010, Banff Centre for Arts & Creativity hosted In(ter)ventions: Literary Practice at the Edge - A Gathering, a conference featuring some foremost literary voices in experimental poetics, including Fred Wah, J.R. Carpenter, Jen Bervin, and Marjorie Perloff. The conference proceedings were recorded. This project examines the accessibility, use-to-date, and research potentials of the recordings of the conference proceedings, as well as the emotional and intellectual impact of literary sound more broadly.
